display_name: Laboratoire d'Ingénierie des Systèmes de Versailles
description:
The LISV is a laboratory of the Versailles University depending on the ministry of Higher Education and Research (EA-4048).
It consists of two teams :

1. Interactive Robotics (RI)
2. Instrumentation and advanced systems and nanosystems modeling (ISA)

More information on http://www.lisv.uvsq.fr/
name: lisv
title: Laboratoire d'Ingénierie des Systèmes de Versailles
